name: collegelife
description: A forum for Stevens students to help them discuss some of the problems they might encounter. Students can post queries in categories regarding specific courses and other students can upvote/downvote the problem or post their own responses, similar to a StackOverflow post.
author: Rohan Menon, Jennider Cafiero, Hanfan Wang, Kajol Acharya, Yiwei Xiang
